name: vscode-custom-loader
description: Allow loading custom JS and CSS into Main and Renderer Process
author: nidefawl

modulelist.title: Module List
modulelist.markdownDescription:
Modules to load in renderer (js/css)

***Workspace configuration is not supported***

VS Code does not load Workspace configurations in the Main Process. Only the local user configuration is applied

path.title: Module directory
path.markdownDescription: Absolute path of a directory to load modules from

modules.title: Module List
modules.markdownDescription: Definition of all modules to load in the defined path

module.title: Module Name
module.markdownDescription:
The module name must contain at least one slash to distinguish it from node internal modules.

Module names must be unique and not clash with VSCode internal module names.

 i.e. 'mylib/mymodule'

file.title: Module Filename
file.markdownDescription:
The filename cannot contain a directory and must have the extension.

i.e. 'main.js' or 'style.css'
